lodash.once v4.1.1
Installation

lodash.once v4.1.1

The lodash method _.once exported as a Node.js module.

Installation

Using npm:

$ {sudo -H} npm i -g npm
$ npm i --save lodash.once

In Node.js:

var once = require('lodash.once');

See the documentation or package source for more details.
